## 1. Introduction


```{r load-packages, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(readr)
suicides <- read_csv("master.csv")
```

```{r}
suicides <- suicides %>% 
  rename(country_year = 'country-year',
         HDI = 'HDI for year')
```


## 2. Data

```{r display-dataframe, message = FALSE}
glimpse(suicides)
```

## 3. Data analysis plan


```{r}
suicides %>% 
  group_by(country) %>% 
  summarise(n = sum(suicides_no))
```



```{r}
suicides %>% 
  group_by(sex) %>% 
  summarise(n = sum(suicides_no)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = sex, y = n)) + 
  geom_col() +
  labs(title = "Suicide Rates by Gender",
       x = "Gender",
       y = "Number of Cases")
```

```{r}
suicides %>%
  rename(`suicides-100k-pop` = 'suicides/100k pop') %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = `suicides-100k-pop`)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Suicide")
```
